{"step_by_step_thinking": "A youthful feminine smile is characterized by certain features. Golden proportion is followed to ensure the teeth are in harmony with each other and the face. Rounding of incisal line angles gives a softer, more feminine appearance. Softened facial line angles also contribute to a youthful, feminine look. However, closure of incisor embrasure is not a characteristic of a youthful feminine smile. In fact, open embrasures are more youthful as they are often seen in younger individuals.", "answer_choice": "B"}
